mapper.select: select t2.* from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS seq ,n.title title ,n.content content ,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') regDate ,n.customer_seq customerSeq from customer n ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE n.id is null AND n.role = 'NOTICE' ORDER BY n.reg_date DESC ) t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc
select count(*) as count from notice
select count(*) as count from (select n.title ,n.content ,DATE_FORMAT(n.regDate, '%Y-%m-%d') regDate ,n.customerSeq customerSeq from notice n ) t where ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select t2.* from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS seq ,n.title ,n.content content ,DATE_FORMAT(n.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') regDate ,n.customer_seq customerSeq from customer n ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where n.id is null and n.role = 'NOTICE' and ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ) t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc

select t2.* from (select n.title ,n.content content ,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') regDate ,n.customer_seq customerSeq from customer n where n.id is null and n.role = 'NOTICE' ) t2 where ${keyField} = #{keyword}
